reviewText: It's a great story, but it's a boring movie.  Somehow the bad acting and directing distracts you from enjoying the film.  No one would take the DVD off me.  I couldn't give it away!  I finally forced my mom's husband to take it.  He's a nice Filipino guy who wouldn't hurt a flea.  I'm sure he dumped that DVD in the nearest garbage can when I wasn't looking so he wouldn't hurt my feelings.
